dt: {bc}something sent forth by emitting: such as
{bc}electromagnetic radiation from an antenna or a celestial body
{bc}substances discharged into the air (as by a smokestack or an automobile engine)

shortdef: an act or instance of emitting : emanation

dt: {bc}the production of sound waves by a material when it is subjected to stress
{bc}the sound waves produced in this manner

dt.t: The elastic energy released when microcracks form should produce a stress wave and associated high-frequency {wi}acoustic emission{/wi} …

shortdef: the production of sound waves by a material when it is subjected to stress; also : the sound waves produced in this manner

dt: {bc}tomography in which a cross-sectional image of regional metabolism is obtained by a usually color-coded representation of the distribution of gamma radiation given off in the collision of electrons in cells with positrons emitted by radionuclides incorporated into metabolic substances that have been administered (as by injection)

shortdef: tomography in which a cross-sectional image of regional metabolism is obtained by a usually color-coded representation of the distribution of gamma radiation given off in the collision of electrons in cells with positrons emitted by radionuclides incorporated into metabolic substances that have been administered (as by injection)

dt: {bc}the emission of electrons from a surface that is bombarded by particles (such as electrons or ions) from a primary source

shortdef: the emission of electrons from a surface that is bombarded by particles (such as electrons or ions) from a primary source
